amendment.description: To provide for more targeted authority under the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.

vote.text: Amendment SA 14 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 60. Record Vote Number: 66.

action.text: Amendment SA 14 proposed by Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S902-903) To provide for more targeted authority under the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 14 proposed by Senator Graham.
